Government Services Animal Control

The Humane Society of North Texas operates a county owned animal and adoption facility at 1904 US Highway 175; next to the county justice center. They may be contacted at 469-376-4120 or kaufman@hsnt.org.

Since the Kaufman facility is often full, the county also utilizes an animal shelter located in Henderson County, 10200 Arnold Hills Rd., Seven Points, Texas, (903) 432-3422.

Talty does not operate an animal control facility.  Please call 911 if you are in immediate danger. Auto Registration Kaufman County Sub-Courthouse Annex 200 E. Main, Forney TX (972) 564-2292 Drivers License Texas Dept. of Public Safety 111 Tejas Drive, Terrell TX  (I-20 East and  exit 148; turn left under I-20; across from Soulman's BBQ) (972) 551-6050 U.S. Post Office 102 E. Broad St. Forney TX 75126 (972) 552-9743 1250 State Highway 34 S Terrell, TX 75160 (972) 563-3237 Weather Emergency Navigate to the Kaufman County web site .  At the bottom left corner there is a "code red," click on this site.  You can complete the form for the county to have your information in order to receive a phone call in an emergency weather situation. Code Enforcement City staff periodically drives the area to spot violations. If you see a problem you may report it to the city offices at talty@taltytexas.com . FEMA Citizens of Talty can now obtain flood insurance from the FEMA program. City of Talty, Texas  |  9700 CR 213, Forney TX 75126   |   Phone: 972.552.9592
